attributes.action: require pedestrians to have insurance & a number plate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are frequent demands for cyclists to be compelled to join drivers in having insurance and a number plate. However, cars are more frequently vandalised or otherwise damaged by pedestrians; it is they who we need to identify and pursue for compensation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
